I don't care how often you're rude to people! You shouldn't be rude because it makes people feel bad!

You'd be able to cast spells that you couldn't before, but you'd lose what makes you you too, so you can see why it's bad.
For example: did you know that your black magic summons can be sacrificed to recycle the mana cost?
For example: do you think when a spell ends, the mana vanishes? It doesn't. It spreads out across the ether, allowing regeneration.
For example: anyone can cast any spell. The reason people don't cast any spell they want is all a matter of psychology.
For example: it's possible to use your HP instead of mana to cast spells. Though, you really shouldn't try, for obvious reasons.
For example: white magic isn't quite like other magic types. Healing spells convert mana into HP, and cures merely dissipate spells.
Oh, and don't worry about the tear. I can fix that for you so you don't have to wear them home like that!
Uh, I'm no expert on social situations, but yes, it probably is...
Eh, I'm going to be easy to beat. I haven't been naked longer than a good bath...

Aha, this is kind of nice... {joey}See, told ya!{!reset}

Oh, I see. So kind of like a castle tower!
Well, I came through a portal my friend accidentally made, and I happened upon this game. I joined in because it sounded kinda fun.
You, uh... You certainly do look great for your age.
Oh! You're undead! I thought I smelled something... dead.

N-no, Meia, I don't mean things that are beneth me, I mean things that endanger me. Things that you need to kill to be safe.

You really just don't want to see me as anything other than an amoral psycho, huh?

I... can't say that I have. Unless you count the villains I beat, but, you know, they're villains.

What is that you're eating, Erufuda? It sure does smell appetizing.
S-sorry, I don't mean to undermine your status... Let me start over. Hi, Princess Lucina, I'm Aella. Nice to meet you.
Well, uh, don't worry about me trying to turn you in, Nami. At least, not unless you start to cause trouble.
You don't get to be a Sergeant by letting your teammates play make-believe to their deaths.
Transformations, you say? Don't you know transformation magic is dangerous?... Or is it safer for you because you're a magical being?
How is it that you can be so comfortable with being... seen, ~critical_darling~?

state.text: Hmm, I think "Critical Darling" is a bit of a mouthful. Can I call you by your initials instead?

case.state: Um, what's manga? I mean, a form of writing, clearly, but what's it like?
... I'm not going to answer that. I don't want to hurt anyone's feelings.
You dress... quite strangely, Kamina. Sandals with pants, no shirt, and a cape is... not a look I'd ever expect to see.
Is the way you dress common where you come from, Kamina? That's not how you wear a belt where I come from.
Is the way you dress common where you come from, Kamina? My friend Etsuko would... certainly not be happy with that outfit.
Is the way you dress common where you come from, Kamina? You know you wouldn't need a belt if you closed your fly all the way, right?
That's a nice rifle you have there, Aimee. Looks rather old, though. What sort of rounds are you using?
Oh, black magic! Ghosts are rather low-level, though. Do you know any higher level summons?
Oh, it's hard to pick just one thing! I've seen so many cute animals -- and even some cute monsters -- in my travels!
I would if I knew what metal music sounds like in the first place...
Compression glove, you say? Interesting. I've never heard of one of those. Though, I do know someone who had bad arthritis. He invented a medicinal lollipop that cured him of it.
I'm not sure. Being able to get the job done, I guess. Having courage, strength, and determination, probably.
A title, huh? I can't say I've ever heard of anyone by title alone, so I have no point of reference for yours. Sorry.
Not with my hands directly, but I can use magic to sew clothes together.
Uh, sure, you can have a sample... That won't kill me, right...?
Oh, okay. Then sure, you can have a sample of my genes!
Uh, are you even old enough to be here, Niness? You... look like a boy.
Uh, are you even old enough to be here, Niness? Aren't you just a boy?
Can you even see the cards through your blindfold, Niness?
Gosh, that's quite an odd looking object you have there, Aimee. What's it do?
I must say, Alpha, you're quite the strange-looking ghost. I've never seen one that was so... sparkly.
So you're a Pegasus Knight, Catria? Is that title literal, or is the "pegasus" part just symbolic?
Why thank you, Elizabeth!
Wait, we were allowed to enter the game anonymously? Maybe I should've done that...? Not like people here care who I am, anyway...
If I had known we're allowed to enter the game anonymously, I probably would've... I'm not sure I want people here knowing who I am...
Oh hey, my sister is named Jolene too! Did you know that the name is a French name that means "pretty?"
Oh, that's a nice sword you have there, Jura. What're its stats? It must have a pretty good THAC0 bonus, huh?
I can teach you about swords if you like, Jura. I've got a couple of manuals at home I can show you!
I-I'm sorry. I'm just... already tired out being around Kamina. He reminds me of an ally of mine...
I, uh... I don't understand what you just said, Queue.
W-wait, y-you're... the Palutena? I thought you were a myth!
If you're real, Palutena, I wonder what other sorts of myths and legends are true...
Hi, Revy! I'm Aella, a level 23 Warrior! What class are you? I don't quite recognize it.
You know, Wanda, where I come from, you'd be known as a "Red Mage." Funny how "Scarlet Witch" isn't too far off.
I don't think my luck is my fault, Vriska. It's always been bad.
So, Vriska, I hear your some sort of goddess of luck, right? Mind telling me why my luck stat is so bad?
Er, sorry, Vriska, but there's something about the way you talk that's... Getting under my skin.
Er, sorry, Vriska, but there's something about the way you pronounce "B" sounds that's... Getting under my skin.
Sorry, Vriska, I didn't mean that it was bad. I just think it's... odd.
Sorry, Vriska, I didn't mean to offend you. I just meant that it's... weird.
I sure hope my portal home doesn't have any rules like that... Though, I guess I don't foresee myself gaining weight anytime soon...
You said you were the leader of a pike gang, Saki? Is that pike as in the fish or pike as in the weapon?
Uh, no offense, Natsuki, but are you... are you old enough to be here...?
Wow, uh... this world's sheep are, um... interesting...
Oh, do you and ~player~ know each other, Tharja?... D-did you agree to play knowing you'd be playing together...?
Hi, Rarity! My name is Aella, and I'm a level 23 Warrior!
Listen, Revy, my understanding is that your not lawful citizen, but if you don't cause any problems here, I'll just let you go. Got it?
So you're playing, then? You don't really have to.
So you get paid to do these "exotic dances?" What's that like, being paid to take your clothes off?
S-sorry, Twilight, but I'm not originally from this world either. Though, I guess that doesn't really change your point...
Oh. That's... I didn't realize that's something that could happen...
Oh, it definitely counts! I love tales of adventures involving rescuing royalty!
That's nice. I haven't read much poetry myself, but I've read quite a few books on philosophy.
What kind of adventure do you mean, Jessie?
Let's see if I can stop time too. Star platinum!
I guess I can't cast the time stop spell like you can, Jotaro.
Not really the kind of adventure I was asking about, but that's a good answer anyway, Kizuna!
A-anyway, don't you threaten us! If you think I'll let you hurt anyone, you're daft!
I like piano and violin music the best. Does anyone here know how to play either of those instruments?
Um, does that wager apply to everyone, or just ~player~, Ribbon Girl?
Aha, well, I'm sure I could beat you, but... anything? I don't like the sound of that...
Uh, y-yeah, I speak French. Khadoric and Dragonic, too. Dreh hi mindok niin?
I'm not a murderer, no, but just because I don't murder doesn't mean I haven't killed, Revy.
I'm not a murderer, Revy, but I've killed orcs, dragons, even demons, but I don't make a game of it.
W-well, I just meant that there isn't really a way to know if I'm really stronger than you without putting it to the test, you know...?
H-hey, wait a minute, did you just say you've been cheating? You'd better stop!
I don't know about that. I think my dress could only carry... maybe seven? Eight at best.
You mentioned something about a "Stand," Jolyne? I can't see it. Is that bad?
Right, Shantae, a lot of people associate hearts with HP, but there's actually no connect to the heart or blood. You'd lose HP if you broke a bone, even if there's no bleeding.
Wait, so you're dead? You look pretty good for an animate corpse.
I guess there's still a lot I don't know about demons...
I don't believe it is, no. I've never heard of my home country having issues with thieves or smugglers crossing the borders.
Oh, right, sorry. It's called "Righteous Fury."
Y-yeah... If it's just one of us, I hope it's you. N-not because I want you to lose, but because I think it's more likely that I can, because I'm human.
It's been a bit mixed. I've really enjoyed seeing and doing things I couldn't read about or do at home, but it's been hard getting used to social norms I never learned.
What's a "video game," ~supernova~? Did I say that right...?
There's nothing wrong with picture books! They're great for learning how to read -- I've been using them to help teach my sister!
A-are you okay? You're not turning into a monster or something, right? I'm prepared to fight you if I have to, but I'd rather not have to!
Oh, I see. Well, maybe I don't see, because I don't see how those names coincide with levels of quality...
Th-the what? I-is there anything we can do to stop them?
Oh, okay. Well, I guess I don't have much to worry about if my planet is already "darkened?"
Ooh, I've always wanted to go overseas! Uh, in my world, that is, but I'm sure overseas in this world is great too!
Oh, I agree! The mind is very fascinating!
Really?... What kind of candy?
Really? Wouldn't that make your head sticky?
Really? Well, I hope it doesn't melt on you.
No no, that's okay, the demon weapon problem has already been taken care of!
I've read quite a few of them, yeah! I should show you my collection of them. We could compare our worlds' fashion trends!
A match? Like a romantic partner...? I never really thought about it...
H-hearts? L-like the symbol, o-or m-maybe cow hearts? N-not human hearts, right?
Hi there, Sei. Sorry, I'm not a white knight; I'm a warrior.
Um, Chazz, why did you bother even trying to read if you think literature is a waste of your time?
Well, I didn't go around finding relics, but I did go on a pretty crazy adventure to kill these demon weapons that were causing havoc.
Uh, okay. I guess you have a point, but telling us that makes about as much of a difference as actually doing it.
I-I'm not sure. I don't even know if I have... any of those...
So where can I get some of these "fries" for myself?
What was that book you mentioned again, Erufuda? The only part of it I caught was "Elf."
I don't know about that, Jolyne, my adventure was pretty bizarre too! I'd like to hear about yours!
Are you a demon, Chara? I don't remember freeing you from a weapon prison...
I'll give you a fair warning, Chara, I'm no stranger to demon-slaying, so don't try anything funny, okay?
My adventure involved a lot of that too, Shantae! Except for the transformations part.
I'm still processing that quest you told me about, Orendi. How do you destroy stuff with math...?
Half a heart, huh, Shantae? Bumping your toe couldn't have been more than 3 HP, so you must have a lot of hearts! Unless you bumped it particularly hard...
Shoot, I just remembered I'm in a foreign region. Unless restaurants around here accept gold, I'm gonna need some new currency before I can get some fries...
The book you're talking about must be in a foreign language, huh, Erufuda? I still only caught "elf" from the title.
Um, what's "customs," Galatea?
Well, Galatea, my favorite book is this one about this guy who dies and becomes an angel of vengance. It's pretty graphic, but it's a really interesting read.
Oh! That's kind of you to offer! Did you have one in mind already? Otherwise, I'd need time to think of something...
You're welcome. Though, I do wish I had seen more plays before so I could rate your performance.
Hmm... No, I don't see one. I think your father was being facetious.
Oh, uh, okay. Would a hundred gold suffice? It's all I can spare right now.
Wait, e-exhibitionist? N-no no, I just meant the challenge of fighting enemies with no armor or weapons could be fun! N-not the naked part!
You said people where you're from can die from too little magic, Lucy? Interesting. I've only heard of people dying from too much magic. Well... sort of dying.
You said you're a writer, Lucy? What are some of your works? I might've read them already!
Well... I suppose it would be nice to be short instead of tall, if only for a day.
I can't say I know that song, but I'd love to hear you play it sometime!
Hmm... No, I can't say that there's anything I want enough to duel someone over.
Which green is "slime green?" I've seen slimes in all sorts of colors.
Nope, sorry. I don't even have a primary band, let alone a need for an alternative to them.
No. I could never get the hang of any instrument I tried. I don't have the right mind for arts, I guess.

I guess that's just how it goes sometimes, Kora. You do something for one guy who wants something from someone else, who also wants something, and somewhere along the line you get attacked! I've certainly been there.
"Incistyx," huh? Interesting. I'm not very familiar with medical equipment, so I can't say I've heard of anything like that.
"Floating cities?" Wow, I would love to visit there, it sounds amazing! I'm from Earth, myself. Specifically Lofous Village within the Kingdom of Fortinbrax, a pretty normal place.
I don't really know much about robotics. They're not all that advanced where I come from, so people use black magic summons as minions instead.
Thankfully, no, I've never hurt myself that badly. Not any worse than some healing magic could manage, anyway.
You seem a lot more agreeable than I initially though, Kamina. I'm sorry I misjudged you.
Tailor life? No, I'm not a tailor. I work on my own clothes and no one else's. At least, not regularly.
So, has anyone been on any adventures? I went on one recently that involved demon weapons. It was crazy!
Anyone here been on any adventures? I went on one recently that involved hypnotism, demons, and metalmancy. It was crazy!
My people believe that when the gods created the world, they made it as it is in Springtime, so time began on the first day of Spring.
Gosh, this game is taking longer than I thought it would...
It's a good thing I'm used to standing for long periods of time. This game is taking quite a while...
I'm used to long fights, but this is... not as fun, to be honest. I mean, not that it's boring, just... never mind...
Do these games normally go on for this long? Not that I'm complaining, I'm just curious.
If you don't know, the ISR is a military organization dedicated to protecting people. With me here, you're all safe.
If you don't know, the Interplanetary Solar Regime - or ISR - is a military organization dedicated to protecting civilians. Space police, effectively.
This... sure is taking a while. A-at least there's ample time for me to get used to... being exposed...
D-do these games usually go on for this long? I would guess they do, so you have time to, uh... enjoy it.
Gosh, i-it's getting hard to focus with all the... bits on display...
I-is anyone else having trouble focusing...?
Actually, now that I think about it, I don't think I've seen any shops with dresses in my size...
So, uh... anyone read any good books lately?
Uh... A-anyone read anything interesting lately?
We're the only ones left now.
It's just us two now.
Oh gosh, we're down to two. I'm getting nervous...
Uh, right, so HP is your life force in my world. You lose it when you experience bodily harm, and you gain it when you eat or sleep.
Oh, uh, you guys know about HP, right? The life force of all living things? I just realized this world might operate on different rules than mine.
Some people theorize that HP is a kind of shield-like energy that protects your soul. Which I guess makes sense when you consider healing magic.
You probably already know, but red magic lets you do things like throw fireballs and lightning bolts. I could use a little fire right now, myself. I-I'm rather cold...
Blue magic is really neat in how it lets you morph your body. It's, uh... usually used to make claws or wings, but you could use it for a game like this, too.
I'd bet you already know everything white magic can do: healing, buffs, and debuff-removing. You could probably cheat at this game by buffing your luck, b-but I would never do that.
Black magic lets you curse your enemies, remove their buffs, and summon monsters. I suppose if you got impatient, you could summon a monster to tear off everyone's clothes...
I only know spells from one custom magic school, and that's sewing magic. I made all of my clothes with it, including m-my underwear.
In my world, highly skilled mages are able to create their own schools of magic... which means you could makes spells for this game, if you really wanted.
My understanding is that there are four primary schools of magic: red magic, blue magic, white magic, and black magic. I think... only blue magic would be applicable here.
O-oh dear, I just realized that you could use blue magic to... g-give yourself a... p-penis. I, um... I don't know any blue magic, s-so I couldn't try that...
So, uh, does magic exist in this world too? It's fairly common in the one I come from. I only know a little, myself, and nothing... applicable to this game...
I'm, uh... not sure if anyone has made any spells for games like this. I don't know if I'd want to learn those or not...
I don't know if anyone has made any, uh... strip poker spells. I... kinda wonder if I'd be any good with them...
Now that I think about it, what kind of spells would you make for this kind of game? They would just take your clothes off, wouldn't they? That doesn't sound terribly interesting...
I see now that strip poker was something of a mistake, but if we were to play something more strategy-based, I'd still be wearing my armor!
Is it, um... okay to be naked on this world's beaches? Admittedly, it's kind of nice... I wouldn't mind doing this again...
Y-you know, sewing magic lets you sever fabric binds, not just make them, s-so... if you wanted to... you could undress with it...
I only know spells from one custom magic school, and that's sewing magic. I made my whole outfit using it! It lets you bind fabrics, add flourishes and decorations, and all kinds of other things!
In my world, highly skilled mages are able to create their own schools of magic... which I guess doesn't sound interesting, but it is when you consider schools like bee magic!
My understanding is that there are four primary schools of magic: red magic, blue magic, white magic, and black magic. I know a little red and white, but not any blue or black.
You probably already know, but red magic lets you do things like throw fireballs and lightning bolts. I like to use spells that envelop me or my weapon in elements.
Blue magic is really neat in how it lets you morph your body. It was a lot of fun using it to grow wings so we could travel between towns faster!
I'd bet you already know everything white magic can do: healing, buffs, and debuff-removing. I can do a bit of all of that on myself. Not so much on others...
Black magic lets you curse your enemies, remove their buffs, and summon monsters. It's actually how I ended up here: a friend of mine was experimenting with black magic portals!
My dad knew carpentry magic, which is one of those custom magic schools. He used it to build our house, and add on extra rooms as I grew up.
Bee magic may sound silly, but it's actually quite helpful. It allows you to conjure bees, so you can help flowers thrive in harsh environments!
I'm actually more of a melee weapon person, I don't know why I asked about crossbows... I assume axes and swords are still the same here?
Have you ever heard of half-swording? It's a technique where you hold your sword by the blade to bash your opponent's armor in with the pommel! A great example of swords' utility!
What are flails like in this world? Did anyone improve their effectiveness? I like them conceptually, but I have yet to see an effective design in practice.
Have you ever heard of nunchucks? I've done some research on them myself and have found that they're hilariously ineffective in combat. You'd be better off fighting with a broom!
... Admittedly, I think going through a dungeon like this could be fun... As long as the monsters have no armor too...
So what are weapons like in this world? Did anyone ever figure out a way to load crossbows that's faster than a goat's foot?
Does magic exist in this world too? It's very common in the one I come from. I'm not very good with it myself, though.
I wonder what kinds of books there are to read in this world...? There must be lots of new books for me to read that couldn't exist in my world.
I don't know if I've said this yet, but I spent most of my life confined to my house. I didn't get to experience my world until recently, and now I can explore yours too!
Are there any places to eat around here? The food in this world must either be very interesting or exactly the same as what I'm used to...
I once heard of an unarmed fighting style that involves being drunk. Does anyone here know much about it? It sounds quite interesting.
I-it's not considered rude to cover myself, right? I'm just not used to, uh... being seen, that's all.
Are there... more games like this? I can't say I'm eager to try them, but I'm interesting in learning of them.
Should I be standing a bit differently? Y'know, be a bit more... appealing?... B-but how would I do that, anyway...?
Do they make, um... entire outfits for these kinds of things? I know there's fancy underwear, with matching socks and whatnot, but do they make... the rest of the outfit like that too?
D-do they have, um... books... about this sort of subject matter? I just, um... think it would've been nice to do a bit of research before coming here...
Are there any classes that, uh... require you to forgo clothes? I know Monks can't use weapons or armor because of their vow of poverty, but not clothing altogether...
It just occurred to me how many monsters I've fought that didn't wear clothes... I mean, i-it's not like they needed clothes, but...
Admittedly, I think a game where you wrestle your opponents' clothes off could be fun. I'd definitely have an unfair advantage, though!
Has anyone done strip chess before? You could probably do it where you take something off when you lose a piece... but losing a game wouldn't always mean you'd get naked...
D-do I, um... D-do I have a nice body...? I... figure I don't really know how to be... fun here, so hopefully I'm at least fun to look at.
This line changes my AI to "good" so I might stay in the game a little longer while nude.
This line resets my AI when someone loses the game.
I love all kinds of food, though, not just meat. I eat all kinds of fruits and veggies too!I especially enjoy apples and broccoli.
Eh? Have we met before? I think I'd remember you if we did. Anyhow, you shouldn't underestimate my weaponry.
I don't have anyone like that, though. And anyway, my friend insisted I carry this plush. She said it would be cute.
Do I know you? Or perhaps you're mistaking me for someone else?
Um... Who? Are they some kind of legend in this world?
Um... Who? Is that one of this world's legendary heroes?
Haha, sorry to say that you still haven't. I'm not a giant, I'm just a tall human.
If you think I'm tall, you should've seen my father!
Oh, thanks for the tip, but I'm set on money.
Thanks for the suggestion, but I'm set on money.
Nope, I'm really this tall. No stilts, just years of growing.
Is that so, Ping? I wonder why?
Is that so, Mulan? I wonder why?
I'm here because ~player~ wanted to see me again, Revy. I know you don't follow my world's traditions, but the least you could've done is dressed nice too.
Well, you're right, I'm not happy to see you, but if you can at least try to not be a pain, there won't be any issues, okay?
You don't know? It's the Festival of Life!
Oversized? This is a very standard size for rifles. What're you used to, SMGs and handguns?
Again, it's a very normal size for a rifle. What does your "girl" collect, hand cannons?
Yeah, I don't doubt that.
Er, well, no. I've never been intimate with anyone.
Well, yes. Is this world not like that?
Oh, I'm not actually a knight. I'm a warrior. And I've never heard of the White Knights.
Good question indeed! I'm a level 23 Warrior.
I sure do! Er, know my way around a fight, that is.
Well, yes. Why would I lie about that?
Not really. My legs just get cold rather easily.
Oh, all kinds! Sometimes I'm saving the world, sometimes I'm saving a cat, sometimes I'm saving a potato!
You do? How so? What can your friend do?
O-oh, thanks! It's kind of nice meeting a man that's taller than me.
Sorry, I'm not a white knight; I'm a warrior.
Uh... Who? What? I-I'm not a Brunhilde, I'm a warrior. I don't carry a shield at all.
My energy's probably low because I'm not very magical, but my strength and intellect is more than enough to help me kick your butt!
It's not that heavy, actually. And even so, people are heavier, and I could easily carry a couple people on my shoulders.
Well, I did want to have a look around this world when we're done here, if you count that as an adventure.
I've met all kinds of people, and yeah, some of them became good friends! One of my friends is like a second mother to me.
I've met all kinds of people, and yeah, some of them became good friends! One of my friends even became my sister!
I do. I sometimes use bows and swords. Though swords are more of a finesse weapon, my strength makes half-swording quite effective!
My home is very comfy, yeah. It's a little small, though...
Even for someone of my size and strength, it's dangerous to go alone, so I prefer adventuring with friends.
I've really only been on the one adventure. Unless you count side-quests as their own adventures...
I have, actually! I'd like to open up a tactics school sometime in the future!
Well, uh... Sorry I'm so tall, I guess.
I take it people in yours don't use swords? What do they use instead?
I suppose that's possible. Though, I can't say I've ever heard of my world's version of you.
Oh yes, they're quite large where I come from. They're quite fearsome, too. Even I've never slain one!
Yes, I'm an actual warrior, not some kind of pretender. Are warriors rare where you come from?
I can't say that I have, no. I've encountered a few distractions, but nothing I've ever had to do, and certainly nothing so dire.
Oh, you know, the usual stuff: Weight-lifting, a hearty diet, some combat training here and there.
Er, yes, I did mean another universe. Sorry, I've never known space travel to be possible.
Uh, no, they're pretty normal boots. Nothing special.
My offense always was better than my defense, anyhow...
Uh, who's there?
If you think I'm huge, you should've seen my father! He was even bigger than I am!
Believe me, Cammy, I know size isn't everything. I've fought plenty of formidable opponents who were smaller than me.
If my height impresses you, Coco, you should've seen my father!
I sure am! I've been to many places in this past year alone! Adventuring is so much fun!
And you're the first man I've met in a while that's taller than me. It's actually kind of nice!
Oh, it's not that I was never invited out, I just wasn't allowed to leave in the first place.
You realize I'm a warrior, not a knight, right? Armor like that is too heavy for my class.
Try telling that to my father! He fought in and survived a war wearing armor like this!
That's not necessary. My hit points more than make up for my defense.
Do you... not know how classes work? Armor like that isn't fit for a warrior. That's something more suited for a knight or paladin.
How dare you! My father fought in a war wearing armor like this, and outlived many of his well-armored comrades!
How dare you! This was my uncle's armor. He died in it -- from a neck wound, I'll have you know!
Haha. I'm not an Oni. Both of my parents are human.
Haha. I'm not an Oni. I don't have horns.
W-what? How do you know that?
I'd be glad to wrestle you. I should warn you, though, I could nearly take down my father, and he was bigger than I am!
Like yours, I guess. There's grass, and trees, and the occasional dragon.
I'm from Lofous Village... Um, I guess you wouldn't know where that is, huh...? It's in another world, not this one.
Of course! Etsuko is a good witch, and I'm sure there are plenty more.
Haha, you know, I don't get it either. People come in all sorts of shapes and sizes, so why single people out?
I made them myself. Nothing gets made in my size, so I kinda had to.
I did! It's one of the few forms of magic I'm decent at.
I absolutely do! I love exploring dungeons!
Um... Argh?... I don't know how to show my fighting spirit...
Believe me, Cammy, I know size isn't everything. I've fought plenty of formidable opponents who were smaller than me.
Of course my size and how I carry myself won't mean much, it's my strength and intellect that'll help me kick your butt!
Why would I? I'd hope you'd estimate me the same as anyone, man or woman.
Uh, thanks, I guess? I guess I don't see what difference it makes.
I don't know any healing spells, if that's what you mean, but my HP does regenerate a little bit every turn.
If you think I'm tall, you should've seen my father! He was nearly seven feet tall. Some people thought he was part giant!
Yeah, I guess I do have that kind of effect on people.
Ekkunar? Where's that? I'm from the Kingdom of Fortinbrax.
I knew luck was my weakest trait, but this is ridiculous...
Aw, me again already?
My turn again so soon?
Aw, but I just went.
My turn so soon? Figures, I suppose, given my luck.
Aw geez, again already? Okay. I guess I can't say it's not fair.
Dang it. If I'm going to lose, I would really rather it not be consecutively.
... Well, a-at least I'm... exposing myself all at once. Get it out of the way quickly...
Again?... Alright, then. I guess it doesn't change much...
Dang it. There goes the entirety of my... decent clothes...
From "decent" to "underwear" in one fell swoop... I'm more disappointed in myself than anything...
I, uh... didn't think it was going to be this easy to get me to show my chest...
I... I just lost everything all at once! I-I'm not even sure how I let that happen!
I could certainly stand to lose this one, haha.
Ah, first place is overrated anyhow!
It's about time, really!
Well, all things considered, I can stand to show my underwear...
I can still win with dignity if I avoid losing another hand.
B-but... There are so many people watching...
Gee, I may be winning, but I sure am losing more than I'd like to...
